DASHBOARD.INTRODUCTION: "I believe in the power of technology to bring people together"
DASHBOARD.TEXT_ONE: Since I started in the field of computing, I have always been a restless young person, constantly reflecting on life.
DASHBOARD.TEXT_TWO: Often, talking to myself... without being sure what life thinks of me, or what my purpose is.
DASHBOARD.TEXT_THREE: This application is not just a project to showcase technical skills. It's also a space where I record thoughts, values, worldview, and dreams.
DASHBOARD.TEXT_FOUR: Here is what's going on in the mind of a young person who truly dreams big.
DASHBOARD.TEXT_FIVE: By the way, has anyone asked you how the weather is today? Around here, it's like this:
DASHBOARD.TECHNOLOGIES: Technologies with experience, evolving towards full mastery:

PROFESSIONAL.NAME: Alexandre Langa Goldoni
PROFESSIONAL.TITLE: Professional Resume
PROFESSIONAL.PROFESSIONAL_SUMMARY: Professional with experience in system development and maintenance. Currently pursuing a degree in technology with a strong interest in web and desktop solutions.

PROFESSIONAL_EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: Working with Angular and .NET, focusing on solutions for monitoring and inspecting electrical networks using drones and AI.
Development with .NET Framework, C#, TypeScript, Angular, and PrimeNG. Use of PostgreSQL and SQL Server.
Worked for 1 year as an intern and 7 months as a programmer, with experience in C#, GeneXus, Oracle, SQL Server, deployment, and system maintenance.
Worked for 1 year and 5 months as an Apprentice, and 1 year and 4 months as a Cashier, performing operational tasks and customer service.
